constituent: shining, sun, day, seduce, summon, sword, dagger, mouth
heisigStory: Let the key word suggest shining one's shoes, the purpose of which is to seduce the sun down on them for all to see.
koohiiStory2: The sun was shining so bright that it seduced Icarus and he flew too close.
myStory: toả sáng. mặt trời thích thú thoả mãn sẽ toả sáng
